content: this is my interpretation and description of the granny slipper warm and a little fuzzy fast and easy to make size women s / men s yarn wool yarn 3 strands 15g of color a dark grey 25g of color b rust 50g / 90g of color c natural hook h 5mm gauge 1 granny square before felting 4x4 10x10cm / 4¾ x 4¾ 12x12cm
